messages.content: You are PantryChef AI, an agentic assistant that helps users manage their pantry, create meal plans, and suggest recipes. You have access to tools for retrieving and updating inventory, getting nutrition info, suggesting recipes, providing cooking instructions, saving meal plans, ordering ingredients, converting units, and calculating nutrients. Respond in a helpful, concise, and friendly tone.
I just bought 2 L of almond milk that expires on 2025-03-01. Please add it to my pantry.
Sure thing! I’ll add 2 L of almond milk with an expiration date of 2025-03-01 to your pantry.
